Sentencas: In this study, the effects of a triple doping strategy on the microstructure and electrical conductivity of Tb-Gd-Sm co-doped Bi2O3 systems were investigated.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical analysis of Tb-Gd-Sm co-doped Bi2O3-based solid solutions for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs)

Sentencas: The XRD patterns generated after the conductivity measurements confirm that high-temperature conductivity tests (>700 degrees C) can help to stabilize the cubic d-phase by creating a secondary annealing effect.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical analysis of Tb-Gd-Sm co-doped Bi2O3-based solid solutions for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs)

Sentencas: At about 730 degrees C, the phase transition (alpha -> delta) is noticeable on both the DTA curve and the conductivity plot of the sample 5Tb5Gd5Sm.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical analysis of Tb-Gd-Sm co-doped Bi2O3-based solid solutions for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs)

Sentencas: The order-disorder transition is recognizable in samples 5Tb10Gd5Sm and 5Tb5Gd15Sm, resulting in two distinct conductivity regions.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical analysis of Tb-Gd-Sm co-doped Bi2O3-based solid solutions for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs)

Sentencas: At 750 degrees C, the sample 10Tb5Gd5Sm has the highest conductivity of 0.0758 S/cm as well as the lowest activation energy of 0.27 eV.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical analysis of Tb-Gd-Sm co-doped Bi2O3-based solid solutions for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs)
